name: zenlog
description: ```js const logger = foo.createLogger({   processors: [     timestamp(),     errors(),     json()   ],   transports: [     console,     emitter,   ] }); logger.log({ level: 'INFO', message: 'Some message', x: 'stuff' }); logger.info('Some message', { x: 'stuff' }) logger.info({ x: 'stuff' }); ```

scripts.coverage: nyc --report html --reporter lcov --reporter text-summary node test

author: Stephen Cresswell
